Title: RHSA-2018:0849: gcc security, bug fix, and enhancement update (Low)
Description:
The gcc packages provide compilers for C, C++, Java, Fortran, Objective C, and Ada 95 GNU, as well as related support libraries.

Security Fix(es):

* gcc: GCC generates incorrect code for RDRAND/RDSEED intrinsics (CVE-2017-11671)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

Additional Changes:

For detailed information on changes in this release, see the Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7.5 Release Notes linked from the References section.

Bugzillas.Title: gcc and gcc-libraries debuginfo clash on aarch64
CVE-2017-11671 gcc: GCC generates incorrect code for RDRAND/RDSEED intrinsics
Need to rebuild rpm in order to remove static relocations not known to older linkers
gcc: incorrect CFI information on i386 with -fstack-clash-protection
